welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Middleborough, a charming city known for its rich history and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Plymouth Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Plymouth Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Bedford Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at New Bedford Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at T. F. Green Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: This concourse handles all domestic flights for airlines such as Delta, United, and American.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: This concourse serves international flights for airlines such as JetBlue and Southwest.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
